author: Dempster13
title: Simply amazing
text: I have never stayed in such a welcoming hotel. The staff were amazing, especially Isabella who was our contact for our stay. We were upgraded to a stunning suite, given complementary use of the business lounge, received prosecco and chocolates in our room. The list goes on. We will definitely be staying there again.
